data.text: Gwa Nguluwi wa heni ulingundewela, ndangulanda unyidichile hondilanda.
Mwela yoo, mowifya ukulu wa heni kwa soni mbaka nili?
Ila mvizele kota Mkulu Nguluwi nakehagulila munhu wa heye yalingumhulichiza mazuwa gose.
Wanhu wenji wangulongaga, “Whaani yalinguweza kutulajila ganojile?”
Ila nakumha heni kusangalala kukulu mnhumbula,
Ndanguwasaga na kuwa na usinjizi kwa kikala goya,
